沪江词库精选horehound extract是什么意思、英语短语。horehound extract的意思是: 夏至草浸剂相关短语:  water horehound 水夏至草  horehound extract 夏至草浸剂.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English hāre hūne, from hār (see hoar) + hūne, the name of the white horehound, also applied to related plants

means.word_mean: 1. any of various aromatic herbs of the genus Marrubium
2. a candy that is flavored with an extract of the horehound plant
